headline: Assessing Enphase Energy (ENPH) Valuation After A Tough Year And Tentative Share Price Recovery
summary: What Enphase Energy’s recent performance tells you Enphase Energy (ENPH) has recently drawn attention after a mixed return profile, with a small gain over the past month but declines over the past 3 months and year. This has prompted investors to reassess its current positioning. At a last close of US$34.52 and a value score of 3, the company sits in a middle ground that raises questions about how its current pricing lines up with recent business trends and long term returns. See our latest...
